author: VegeTato
description:
This extension is useful to make Pets follows you:
-On ground
or
-Flying (and avoid obstacles)

Note: The extension requires Platformer behavior
Note2: The extension requires Pathfinding behavior
name: Pets

eventsFunctions.description: Set object to follow another object
eventsFunctions.name: FollowObjectFlying
eventsFunctions.sentence: Make _PARAM1_ follow _PARAM2_ at _PARAM4_ speed at distance X _PARAM5_ and distance Y _PARAM6_

parameters.description: Pet object
parameters.name: Object

parameters.description: Object to be followed
parameters.name: FollowedObject

parameters.description: Platformer behavior
parameters.longDescription: Make sure to set the (Platformer character)behavior gravity to 0 if that object is a pet
parameters.name: Behavior

parameters.description: Pet follow speed (in pixel)
parameters.longDescription: Example: 0.06
parameters.name: Speed

parameters.description: Distance X between the pet and the followed object
parameters.longDescription: (0 For followed object X) (Negative numbers is optional)
parameters.name: DistanceX

parameters.description: Distance Y between the pet and the followed object
parameters.longDescription: (0 For followed object Y) (Negative numbers is optional)
parameters.name: DistanceY

parameters.description: Flip the pet direction when the followed object flip ?
parameters.name: Flip

parameters.description: Flip the pet when the followed object flip ?
parameters.name: FlipPet

parameters.description: Make pet object fly around this object, while the followed object is idle ?
parameters.name: Random

parameters.description: Flip the pet while in idle, if he is on right or left the followed object ?
parameters.name: RandomFlip

parameters.description: Pet swapping idle positions speed (in pixel)
parameters.longDescription: Leave it empty if you set the idle to No
parameters.name: IdleSpeed

parameters.description: Time before the pet goese to idle condition (in second)
parameters.longDescription: Leave it empty if you set the idle to No
parameters.name: IdleTimer

parameters.description: Pet swapping idle positions speed (in pixel)
parameters.longDescription: Example: 0.06  ,Leave it empty if you set the idle to No
parameters.name: PetsIdleSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: Set object to follow another object
eventsFunctions.name: FollowObjectOnGround
eventsFunctions.sentence: Make _PARAM1_ follow _PARAM3_ at _PARAM5_ speed at distance X _PARAM6_

parameters.description: Pet object
parameters.name: Object

parameters.description: Platformer behavior
parameters.longDescription: Make sure to Uncheck "Default controls" for the pet platformer character behavior
parameters.name: BehaviorForPet

parameters.description: Object to be followed
parameters.name: FollowedObject

parameters.description: Platformer behavior
parameters.name: Behavior

parameters.description: Pet follow speed (in pixel)
parameters.longDescription: Example: 200
parameters.name: Speed

parameters.description: Distance X between the pet and the followed object
parameters.longDescription: (0 For followed object X) (Negative numbers is optional)
parameters.name: DistanceX

parameters.description: Flip the pet direction when the followed object flip ?
parameters.name: Flip

parameters.description: Flip the pet when the followed object flip ?
parameters.name: FlipPet

parameters.description: Make pet object walk around while the followed object is idle ?
parameters.name: Random

parameters.description: Flip the pet while in idle, if he is on right or left the followed object ?
parameters.name: RandomFlip

parameters.description: Pet timer swapping idle positions speed (in second)
parameters.longDescription: Leave it empty if you set the idle to No
parameters.name: IdleSpeed

parameters.description: Time before the pet goese to idle condition (in second)
parameters.longDescription: Leave it empty if you set the idle to No
parameters.name: IdleTimer

parameters.description: Pet swapping idle positions speed (in pixel)
parameters.longDescription: Example: 100  ,Leave it empty if you set the idle to No
parameters.name: PetsIdleSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: Pets follow object when in range

eventsFunctions.description: Pets follow object when out of range
